entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HttpStress is broken on Windows (CAP_SYS_PTRACE) #76045
    8.0.0
  • SslStress: SocketException (995) WSA_OPERATION_ABORTED in most Windows runs #76044
    8.0.0
  • Intermittent failure in CriticalFinalizer test #76041
    8.0.0
  • msbuild segfault on arm64 linux package restore #76039
  • [API Proposal]: Add System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RefSafetyRulesAttribute #76032
    8.0.0
  • Out Of Memory From Pinned byte[] used in SslStream #76029
  • DateTime.ParseExact randomly yielding wrong DateTime.Kind #76037
  • [API Proposal]: ReadOnly empty collection singletons #76028
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector128:ExtractMostSignificantBits on ARM64 and AMD64 #76025
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Base64.IsValid #76020
    8.0.0
  • Blazor Wasm Crashes if another wasm instance is running in the service worker. #76026
    6.0.11
  • System.Net.Security.Tests - Helix timeout on Mono #76019
  • [ProfilerAPI] No more ModuleLoadFinished callbacks for dynamic modules #76016
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by non-mathematical expression #76015
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing Dictionary by object key #76014
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing `Dictionary` by `string` key #76013
    8.0.0
  • DateTimeOffsetAdapter::ToString unused parameter #76012
    Future
  • Distributed Transactions (MSDTC) code blocking on disposal of Transaction Scope #76010
  • Stable Dictionary sorting for System.Text.Json #76008
    Future
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Memory.Span<Char> #76027
  • Permissions in ZipArchive Missing on Linux - Regression in .Net 7 RC1? #76006
  • [NativeAot] ComWrappers don't work on Linux #76005
    8.0.0
  • SQLException.Number property differs on Linux OS and Windows. #76004
  • build-android-rootfs.sh Must be fix the "termux" URL #76002
  • Cannot evaluate. Expression 'System.Data.NameNode' is not an aggregate #76001
    Future
  • Test failure baseservices/threading/generics/Monitor/EnterExit14/EnterExit14.sh #75997
    7.0.0

Closed

  • COM event with recursion .net 6 problem #73754
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_255294/DevDiv_255294/DevDiv_255294.sh #44341
    Future
  • CodeGen constructor called with invalid theCompiler argument #73089
    Future
  • [Feature Request] System.Text.Json: Built-in Converter of Serializing/Deserializing generic ObservableCollection<T> properties of custom classes #75977
  • Please add Empty to ReadOnlyCollection<T> #41147
    Future
  • [RyuJIT] inline CORINFO_HELP_TYPEHANDLE_TO_RUNTIMETYPE #49429
    8.0.0
  • XmlSerializerTests fail in NativeAOT runs #76018
  • Kerberos Authentication failure in HTTP Client in Linux (.NET6) #75951
  • Configuring Console Json Formatting with JsonWriterOptions doesn't work with Trimming #73822
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console failures #73436
    8.0.0
  • dnSpy: Assertion failed '(varDsc->TypeGet() == TYP_I_IMPL) && lcl->TypeIs(TYP_BYREF)' #74259
    8.0.0
  • System.Runtime failed to load #76009
  • Distributed transactions: AccessViolationException on arm64 #74170
    7.0.0
  • critical_finalization tests fails with GCStress=0x3 #75782
    8.0.0
  • [libraries-pgo] Issues related to overlapped IO #75828
    8.0.0
  • Redundant load-acquire elimination discrepancy between CoreCLR and Clang #47261
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure gc collects memory for CriticalFinalizer test #76046
    community-contribution
  • Improve List<T>.AddRange performance for enumerables #76043
    area-System.Collections
  • Optimized StreamPipeReaderInternal InternalTokenSource getter #76042
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • JIT: fix issue with unreachable blocks in redundant branch opt #76040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set `AppHostSigningException.ExitCode` #76038
    area-HostModel
  • [workloads] Work around main still targeting net7.0 #76036
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0] Remove locks from COM events delegate management. #76035
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Remove locks from COM events delegate management. #76034
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.x
  • [mono][aot] Prefer specific instances instead of gshared for methods … #76033
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Ensure that frozen objects respect the minimum object size #76031
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Removing short name column from compphases.h #76030
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add back missing conv opcodes when compiling via System.Linq.Expressions #76024
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • [wasi] prevent mono on wasi from crashing on GC #76023
    area-GC-mono
  • [MONO][TEST] Update issues.targets for CheckProjects tests #76022
    test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Smarter ordering of late args based on register uses #76017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Add and utilize number of contexts with diffs #76011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix not to create unnecessary `thread_params` #76007
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove some extra static arrays used in Split() #76003
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Disable EventSource support in NativeAOT by default #76000
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Update Wasm.Build.Tests to use latest sdk, and target net8.0 #75998
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Cache dynamically generated RSA keys in tests #75995
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Remove usages of Ubuntu 16.04 from pipelines #75513
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Initial unification of DynamicMethod to be shareable between runtimes #75829
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update 6.0 dotnet install quality #75722
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • Fix critical finalization test #75952
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Improve "vec == Vector128<>.Zero" #75999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc2] [Mono] Restore old code to solve the recent SpanHelpers regressions #75996
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Remove locks from COM events delegate management. #75863
    area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: improve scalability of optReachable #75990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allocate RuntimeType objects on Frozen Object Heap #75573
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update owner/mentionees for System.Transactions #76021
    area-Meta
  • Update area owners #75975
    area-Meta
  • Preserve last error for patchpoint helpers #75922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Configuring Console Json Formatting with JsonWriterOptions doesn't work with Trimming #75943
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Delete more verification code #72747
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Delete `GTF_VAR_CAST` #74461
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Update solution files under src/libraries #75988
    area-Meta
  • Clean-up InteropServices.JavaScript project file #75962
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/7.0] Update RateLimiting ref assembly #75978
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Set names to runtime internal threads #75113
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Sum intrinsic for amd64 #75142
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/7.0] Enable doc generation for source-build #75985
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Mono] Restore old code to solve the recent SpanHelpers regressions #75917
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance

Updated

  • Only R2R blittable IL stubs that aren't inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Ensure regions never use more than 99% of the heap hard limit #75038
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: properly update trees in optOptimizeBoolsGcStress #75992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #75363
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix binary serialization of DateTime with DCS and add test. #75650
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Fold SIMD-typed partial access to locals; delete base types from vector constants #74580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Disallow TimeSpan.Zero in rate limiters #75496
    area-System.Threading
  • [release/6.0] Allow for null XmlSerializers when loading pre-gen from mappings. #75638
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Bring back readability lost in .Net 6, and stop emitting BOM. #75637
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix `DataContractJsonSerializer`'s handling of -0.0 #75643
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Make sure we at least sweep the loh even when we wanted to compact it #74626
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Manually backporting #74599 #75648
    area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • Outerloop fix for libraries #74468
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, no-recent-activity, needs-author-action
  • [JIT] CodeGen verification testing #75102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Avoid recommitting the mark array #75208
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Join the special sweep decision #75572
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Use UTF8 encoding on Tar string fields #75902
    area-System.IO
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #75913
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Update compiler build #75935
  • Audit MemoryExtensions.IndexOf variants #75754
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Fix numeric IntPtr behavioral changes analyzer findings #75557
    area-Meta
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for emitOutputRRR(). #75934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [release/7.0] Close MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources (#75163, #75441) #75521
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Add missing DynamicallyAccessMembers attributes to System.Data.Common/ref #75980
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Data, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • Support a few "shifted register" operations on Arm64 #75823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement IEEE754 totalOrder comparer #75517
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Enable CI for macOS x64/arm64 #75421
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Publish hostcommon static library #75858
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Clean up of SPC to match ref assembly public surface for Mono and CoreCLR #75954
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm][debugger] Support create, debugging and running wasmbrowser template from VS #75986
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior; Make the Utf8JsonWriter always insert newlines between the end of comments and the start of arrays or objects #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Issue #75070 - Add PriorityQueue DequeueEnqueue Method #75993
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Simplify handling of multi-reg returns #74499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Fix System.Runtime.InteropServices tests #75669
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Remove hardcoded limit in deserialization constructor arguments #75982
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove `JToken` properties that are for internal use only #75958
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Memory model document. #75790
    area-Meta, memory model
  • Add option for truncated stream detection #75671
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • remove explicit LangVersion from a few projects #75806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add Vector128 AndNot intrinsic for amd64 #74586
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove XmlConvert.StrEqual and use Span<char>.StartsWith() instead. #74955
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assumption about relative path for project files #28115
  • [6.0.10x] NuGet version incoherency between sdk and templating #28107

Closed

  • opencover does not work with .NET SDK 7.0.100-rc.1.22431.12 and TFM pointing to .NET 7 #28112
  • [Loc]With net6 RTM SDK installed on locale OS, overtranslate issue occurs when runing "dotnet publish -r win-x64" in CLI. #22166

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #28116
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Provide package description for APICompat packages #28102
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix Property Parsing in Publish #28059
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #28098
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Pin MSBuild references to a lower version [main] #28106
  • [Backport] Fix Property Parsing in Publish #28061
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #28062
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2001402 #27667
  • Revert "do not emit diagnostic when attribute argument is internal type" #27774
    Area-ApiCompat

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Open issue]: static abstract interfaces and static classes #5783
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Raw string literals guide line is shifted when using tabs #64230
  • StackOverflowException when compiling project with large (12MB) cs file and targeting net6.0 #64225
    17.4
  • Ref and in parameters used in ternary vs if statement #64224
  • Consider passing checksum algorithm to TextLoader.LoadTextAndVersion #64220
    17.4
  • Consider obsoleting/internally banning SyntaxTree.Encoding #64219
  • Missing ref safety error inside `foreach` #64218
    17.4
  • IDE0060 is reported incorrectly when parameters has nullable attributes attached #64215
  • Add support for reporting analyzer diagnostics in editorconfig files #64213
    17.4

Closed

  • New Stack Trace Explorer only works with English stack traces #62436
    17.4
  • task+closure #64217
  • Convert Type to Record #62623
  • IDE0059 Unnecessary assignment of a value to => CS0165 Use of unassigned local variable #57650
    17.3
  • Suggestion: some way to suppress IDE0073 on a per-file basis #64208
  • False positive IDE0060 for partial method with SG #57814
    Backlog
  • Switch pattern matching with throwing default returns object with wrong boxed datatype #64196
  • False IDE0059 message #64198
  • XAML: Provide better support for AdditionalFiles analyzers #44131
    Backlog
  • Lack of a fresh Roslyn version in the Mono project #64174
  • Missing CS8970 when applying attribute class having unsupported type arguments from containing type #58837
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove code that thinks it needs to close a document before removing #64232
    Area-IDE
  • Remove TextDocumentState.sourceText #64231
    Area-IDE
  • Remove editor item from MatchResult #64229
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unused TS brace completion code #64226
    Area-IDE, Community
  • EnC: Add a couple of filters to improve diagnosability of crash dumps #64223
    Area-Interactive
  • Remove exportProvider parameter from TestWorkspace ctor #64221
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for reporting analyzer diagnostics in editorconfig files #64214
    Area-IDE, Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Support `scoped` keyword in `foreach` statement. #64209
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields

Merged

  • Unwrap the cause (inner exception) of operation canceled exceptions when reporting faults #61787
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert "Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change)" #64228
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64227
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add multiple language support to stack trace explorer #64204
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64222
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Convert To Record Refactoring/Code Fix initial offering #63654
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records, Next
  • Remove unused value assignment lambda capture case #62057
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64216
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • No IDE0060 for unused parameter in partial method implementation #63530
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64212
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Check generic containing attribute types #64006
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64211
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Emit `[module: RefSafetyRules]` attribute only if the module contains type declarations #64201
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64210
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add a completion list filter for enum member #64054
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Skip some more tests that are currently failing on debug 32-bit #64207
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64203
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64205
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64206
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64235
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64234
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64233
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use warnings for escape analysis in unsafe context #64186
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Format parameters as names in error messages #64179
    Area-Compilers
  • Show linked symbol in Inheritance Margin #60225
    Area-IDE
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Disable quickinfo on new inline rename #63907
    Area-IDE
  • Support `scoped` keyword in `for` statement. #64154
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add more telemetry for rename #61370
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE
  • Try to reduce JIT costs for AbstractLogAggregator #64172
    Area-IDE
  • More sync command handlers #63579
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure we use the type name in a default expression to prevent conflicts #63964
    Area-IDE
  • Non positional option for Convert To Record #63848
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Detect ref assemblies in rebuild #59491
    Area-Infrastructure
  • TextLoader method override detection #64192
    Area-IDE
  • Colorize langword inside doc comments #63900
    Area-IDE, Community
  • use xunit apis for test discovery #64156
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use workspace services to implement test hooks #64158
    Area-IDE
  • Fix confusing `ref` usage error messages #64183
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor template first link fills whole horizontal space inside top-row #44133
  • (Http)(Validation)ProblemDetails converters should obey JsonOptions.JsonNamingPolicy #44132
  • Checkbox is not checked when the bound value is true and if the input type is set by code #44130
  • [Blazor Server] Blazor Server Freezes When Opening A New Tab #44124
  • Duende.IdentityServer from Blazor WebAssembly App protecting ASP.NET Core API using Client Credentials with custom allowed scope - invalid_scope #44122
  • `dotnet-getdocument` fails to resolve GetDocument.Insider for net7.0 #44119
    7.0.0
  • Add an Analyzer to recommend using DIM properties with IHeaderDictionary instead of indexer #44116

Closed

  • Quarantine ApplicationInitializationPageIsRequested #42658
    Test failures
  • Quarantine EnableCoreHostTraceLogging_PipeCaptureNativeLogs #42913
    Test failures
  • Quarantine FrameworkNotFoundExceptionLogged_File #43087
    Test failures
  • Quarantine EnableCoreHostTraceLogging_FileCaptureNativeLogs #42820
    Test failures
  • Opensource but why has not source? #44101
    Discussions
  • Swagger method with empty body for grpc get request #42407
    7.0.0
  • Razor Pages 404 after updating to ASP.NET Core 7 RC1 #44002
  • New endpoints exposed by OpenAPI documentation compared to before ASP.NET Core 7 RC1 #44005
    7.0.0
  • Blazor Wasm ASP.NET Core Hosted IWebHostEnvironment.WebRootPath null when debugging #44110
  • This is by design. `FromBody` uses serializers such as Newtonsoft.Json which have a different feature set compared to model binding. Model binding - indicated by `FromQuery`, `FromRoute` etc, requires that complex types have a parameterless constructor. #44006
  • [Loc]With net6 preview 7 installed on locale OS, some template names are unlocalized after runing "dotnet new --list" in CLI #34412
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_actix, https #43999
  • Perf regression: endpoint #44097
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #44103
  • Blazor wasm .NET 6 rc2 unable to use RegisterForJavaScript RootComponents when publishing #38044

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix up packaging for Extensions.ApiDescription.Server #44136
    Servicing-consider, area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #44135
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/7.0] Update spa-templates to ref new 7.0 branch #44134
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, feature-spa, feature-templates, 7.0.0
  • Fix up packaging for Extensions.ApiDescription.Server #44129
    Servicing-approved, area-commandlinetools, 7.0.0
  • Update BuildFromSource docs to be more scenario focused #44127
    Docs, area-infrastructure
  • Add header dictionary analyzer and fixer #44123
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Fix item template `groupIdentity` and `identity` values #44121
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, area-grpc, feature-templates, 7.0.0
  • Try Win11 arm queue #44118
    area-infrastructure
  • Try Silicon arm helix queue #44117
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Unquarantine IIS tests affected by reverted dispose fix #44126
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Fix item template `groupIdentity` and `identity` values #44120
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, area-grpc, feature-templates, 7.0-rc2
  • Updating the SDK, hopefully fixing template tests #44087
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Retry template tests due to current publish flakiness #44137
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2001161 #43956
    area-infrastructure
  • Update Roslyn versions #44072
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0.0
  • Input components two way binding + InputBase handling of unparsable inputs #40326
    area-blazor, community-contribution, .NET 8 Planning
  • Use perfect-hash in HttpUriScheme.GetKnownMethod(string) instead of trie #44096
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix DetectMisplacedLambdaAttribute analyzer and tests #44061
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Change gRPC JSON to only accept top-level field as request body #44055
    Servicing-consider, area-grpc, 7.0.0
  • Add RequestDelegate analyzer #44048
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime
  • Fix the IsKnownImmutableType method to return true for enum types #42901
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Route tooling redux #44077
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Add IgnoreQueryString parameter to NavLink #40990
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • JSON "null" request body rejected as an empty request body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Fix flaky HTTP/2 test #41181
    area-runtime
  • Resume the IIS state machine on the thread pool #41271
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet-dump collect process crash. Unable to read beyond the end of the stream. #3401
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix int overflow found by vendor testing #3406
    auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • First Maui app on Visual Studio fails to build. dotnet/library-packs missing #10278
  • [Android] Splash Screen BaseSize broken #10275
  • MAUI Flyout doesnt work on Android when not using Shell #10274

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • One to many plus One to One with same entity #29183
  • Unnecessary joins in split queries causing performance issues #29182

Closed

  • Accessing DbSet.Local with context pooling causes a memory leak #29164
    7.0.0-rc2

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Reset LocalView when returning context to the pool #29181
    Servicing-approved

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Microsoft .Net Core Version 5.0.17 keeps reinstalling #14473

PullRequests

Created

Merged
